entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 8:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: SW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with a few flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
